BecomeAseller.Header: Everything you need to start selling online!
BecomeAseller.Tab1ContentSubHeader: Selling online has never been easier.
BecomeAseller.Tab1ContentRow1Content: Get straight to growing your business. We handle everything to sell online. So you can focus on your business rather managing the infrastructure.
BecomeAseller.Tab1ContentRow2Content: Get a holistic and detailed view of your business to better understand sales, orders, and customers to better tailor your products.
BecomeAseller.Tab1ContentRow3Content: We don't keep your money! The payment goes to you directly as soon as a buyer pays.
BecomeAseller.Tab2ContentSubHeader: It's Good To Know How The System Works, Before You Register.
BecomeAseller.Tab2Contentlistitem1Content: After you list your offers, customers can visit them on the Marketplace. We'll notify you when customers place an order. Fulfill the order on promised time is very important.
BecomeAseller.Tab2Contentlistitem2Content: Listing your products is really simple through our easy to use the self-serve portal. Upload including high-quality product images and additional details.
BecomeAseller.Tab2ContentRow3Content: We don't keep your money! The payment goes to you directly as soon as a buyer pays.
